dataset module

class dataset.MultiClassLaneDataset(image_dir, mask_dir, transform=None, num_augmentations=2)[source]

Bases: Dataset

A custom dataset for multiclass lane detection.

Loads images and their corresponding multiclass masks (0: background, 1: driveable, 2: lanes), applies optional data augmentations, and returns them as PyTorch tensors for training or validation.

Parameters:

  • image_dir (str) – Directory containing the input images (expected to be .jpg files).

  • mask_dir (str) – Directory containing the ground truth multiclass masks (expected to be .png files).

  • transform (callable, optional) – Albumentations pipeline for data augmentation. Defaults to None.

  • num_augmentations (int, optional) – Number of augmented versions per image. Defaults to 2.

image_dir

Directory with input images.

Type:

str

mask_dir

Directory with ground truth masks.

Type:

str

transform

Data augmentation pipeline.

Type:

callable

num_augmentations

Number of augmentations per image.

Type:

int

images

List of image filenames.

Type:

list

total_samples

Total dataset size, including augmentations.

Type:

int

base_transform

Base transformation pipeline to ensure fixed size and normalization.

Type:

A.Compose

dataset.train_transforms = Compose([   Resize(p=1.0, area_for_downscale=None, height=144, interpolation=0, mask_interpolation=0, width=256),   HorizontalFlip(p=0.5),   RandomBrightnessContrast(p=0.5, brightness_by_max=True, brightness_limit=(-0.2, 0.2), contrast_limit=(-0.2, 0.2), ensure_safe_range=False),   RandomGamma(p=0.5, gamma_limit=(80.0, 120.0)),   Normalize(p=1.0, max_pixel_value=255.0, mean=(0.41, 0.39, 0.42), normalization='standard', std=(0.15, 0.14, 0.15)),   ToTensorV2(p=1.0, transpose_mask=False), ], p=1.0, bbox_params=None, keypoint_params=None, additional_targets={'mask': 'mask'}, is_check_shapes=True)

Training data augmentation pipeline.

Applies a series of transformations to augment images and masks for training: - Resizes images and masks to 144x256 pixels. - Randomly flips images horizontally with 50% probability. - Adjusts brightness and contrast randomly with 50% probability. - Adjusts gamma to enhance lane lines with 50% probability. - Normalizes pixel values using specified mean and standard deviation. - Converts images and masks to PyTorch tensors.

Parameters:

  • image (numpy.ndarray) – Input image with shape [H, W, 3].

  • mask (numpy.ndarray) – Input mask with shape [H, W].

Returns:

Dictionary containing augmented image and mask tensors.

Return type:

dict

dataset.val_transforms = Compose([   Resize(p=1.0, area_for_downscale=None, height=144, interpolation=0, mask_interpolation=0, width=256),   Normalize(p=1.0, max_pixel_value=255.0, mean=(0.41, 0.39, 0.42), normalization='standard', std=(0.15, 0.14, 0.15)),   ToTensorV2(p=1.0, transpose_mask=False), ], p=1.0, bbox_params=None, keypoint_params=None, additional_targets={'mask': 'mask'}, is_check_shapes=True)

Validation data transformation pipeline.

Applies minimal transformations to prepare images and masks for validation: - Resizes images and masks to 144x256 pixels. - Normalizes pixel values using specified mean and standard deviation. - Converts images and masks to PyTorch tensors.

Parameters:

  • image (numpy.ndarray) – Input image with shape [H, W, 3].

  • mask (numpy.ndarray) – Input mask with shape [H, W].

Returns:

Dictionary containing transformed image and mask tensors.

Return type:

dict
